attributes.action: Properly protect our Heritage (Historic building and the like)
attributes.additional_details:
Over the years countless of buildings have been destroyed because of lack of care and interest by the local council and the Government. 
Let’s make a change and protect our future historic background. 
We want you to make sure that what we have mentioned above will be protected from vandalism and arsonists.
attributes.background: We want a future that remembers and protects our British history, Traditions, Historical buildings and Artefacts. We want awareness about historic places and to conserve them.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call for a specific action by the Government or House of Commons.

We understand that you are concerned about lack of upkeep of historic building and other artifacts, but it's not clear what you want the Government to do about this.

We have published the following petitions, some of which you might like to sign:

Require referendums on the removal of historically significant statues: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326361

Protect all monuments and statues from being taken down: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325814

Make it a specific offence to desecrate national flags, symbols and monuments: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325545

Require developers relocate not demolish buildings of historical interest: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553878

If you want the Government to take an action no covered by the above you could start a new petition requesting this, but it would need to be clear what action you want the Government to take.
